title: Himi 376
lyrics:
8.6.8.6.8.8.8.6.
Ko e ʻAkau
1.
Vakai e Lami ‘a e ‘Otua
‘I he ‘Akau.
He lingi hono ta’ata’a
ʻI he ‘Akau.
Mou ha’u ni ‘o fanongo mai,
“ʻIlai, lama sapa
ka
tanai!”
Ne tangi ‘o ne mate ai
‘I he ‘Akau.
2.
Ne tukifa’o hono nima
‘I he ‘Akau.
Ne hoka hono vakavaka
‘I he ‘Akau.
Liliu e ‘aho ko e pō,
Kae fai pē ‘ene fakatō
Ki lalo ‘a e kau tevolo
‘I he ‘Akau.
3.
Vakai he hiki ki ‘olunga
‘I he ‘Akau.
Ne inumia ‘a e ipu mala
‘I he ‘Akau.
Vakai he mofuike fau,
Haeua hifo ‘a e Tatau,
Kae fai ‘a hotau feilaulau
‘I he ‘Akau.
4.
Te u ‘alu ‘o malangalanga
‘I he ‘Akau.
Te u pōlepole ta’engata
‘I he ‘Akau.
‘E ‘ikai mo ha me’a si’i
‘E fai ki ai ha vīkiviki
‘I taimi pe ‘itāniti,
Ko e ‘Akau pē, ko e ‘Akau.*
